snippet: A man and his pregnant wife were on the way to a doctor when they were fatally injured in a Brooklyn collision, but their son was delivered.
abstract: Newlyweds and expectant parents Raizy and Nathan Glauber are killed in hit-and-run car crash in Williamsburg, Brooklyn; doctors deliver couple's son prematurely in what friends and family hail as a precious gift.

byline.original: By ANEMONA HARTOCOLLIS and NATE SCHWEBER
byline.contributor: J. David Goodman, Michael Schwirtz and Julie Turkewitz contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A man and his pregnant wife were on the way to a doctor when they were fatally injured in a Brooklyn collision, but their son was delivered.

headline.seo: Brooklyn Couple Expecting Baby Killed on Way to Doctor
headline.main: Couple Expecting Baby Are Killed in Car Crash; Doctors Deliver a Boy
headline.print_headline: Couple Expecting Baby Are Killed in Car Crash; Doctors Deliver a Boy
